description.ko: 이 영상은 하나의 흰색 광선이 수정 프리즘을 통해 다채로운 색채의 폭발로 변하는 빛의 우아한 물리학을 포착합니다.
description.en: This visual captures the elegant physics of light as it transforms from a single white ray into a diverse explosion of colors through a crystal prism.

prompt: A macro cinematic shot of a triangular glass prism on a dark minimalist surface. A single beam of brilliant white light enters the prism, refracting into a vibrant, sharp rainbow spectrum on the other side. Hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, ray tracing, soft bokeh background, prismatic light dispersion.
